info.title: Expenses
info.description: This is the REST API documentation for Workday Expenses. You can use the APIs and supported operations documented here to extend the functionality of Workday Expenses.

tags.name: Entries
tags.description:
Self-service Expense Entries that are user modifiable and can be used in an Expense Report for that user. This can typically be a quick expense with a minimal set of fields. 

Example: $50 spent on `Car Rental` (an Expense Item).

Secured by: `Self-Service: Expense Report`

tags.name: ExpenseItems
tags.description:
Resource to operate on Expense Items. 

Example: Car Rental

Secured by: `Access Expense Item (Segmented)`, `View: Expense Item`

tags.name: Reports
tags.description:
Resource used for creating, editing, and submitting Expense Reports. 

Example: Trip to San Francisco, referencing an Expense Entry `$50 spent on Car Rental`

Secured by: `Self-Service: Expense Report`

id.name: id
id.description: The unique Workday Identifier (WID) for the resource. Only WID will work here.

body.name: entriesBody
body.description: Expense Entry object that needs to be created

get.description: Gets all the Expense Entries for the user sorted by date in ascending order.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: The earliest date for which to retrieve the Expense Entries, inclusive of the date.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The latest date for which to retrieve the Expense Entries, inclusive of the date.

parameters.name: expenseEntryStatus
parameters.description:
The status for the expense entries. Possible WIDs for this query parameter are
  New -> dc74b9a0446c11de98360015c5e6daf6
  Pending -> dc74b8b0446c11de98360015c5e6daf6
  Expensed -> dc74ba90446c11de98360015c5e6daf6
  Closed -> dc74bb80446c11de98360015c5e6daf6
  Prepaid -> fdef527489e34c00b438b5dd7dacee79
  Do Not Show -> 281f291f7a1b4a2b8c9e94b0e733510e
  Paid -> d5478541ee1b431ab34a28339b40caf5

parameters.name: entryType
parameters.description:
The type of expense for the expense entries. Possible WIDs for this query parameter are
  Quick Expense -> 744524587a9b4f74bdaa69fd7ffb91fc
  Credit Card Transaction -> cd152f26446c11de98360015c5e6daf6
  Travel Booking Record -> 3b370c53eda4100004772fea0e870002

200.description: A list of Expense Entries for the user.  The list is filtered by fromDate, toDate, entryType, and/or status if the parameters are included.

post.description: Creates a new Quick Expense instance for the user.

parameters.name: entryBody
parameters.description: Details for the new Quick Expense instance.

400.description:
- Date is required for non-OCR request.
- Only 1 image attachment is accepted for OCR request.

get.description: Gets details of an Expense Entry referenced by its Workday Identifier (WID).

put.description: Updates an Expense Entry referenced by its Workday Identifier (WID). Note that only Expense Entries with a type of "Quick Expense" and a status of "New" may be edited.

400.description: Quick Expense status is not new.

patch.description: Updates an Expense Entry referenced by its Workday Identifier (WID) for the fields provided in the body. Note that only Expense Entries with a type of "Quick Expense" and a status of "New" may be edited.

400.description: Quick Expense status is not new.

delete.description: Deletes an Expense Entry referenced by its Workday Identifier (WID). Note that only Expense Entries with a type of "Quick Expense" and a status of "New" may be edited.

400.description: You can only delete quick expense. You can't delete credit card transactions or travel booking records.

post.description: Adds the attachment to the existing entry

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique Workday Identifier (WID) of Entry

parameters.name: attachment
parameters.description: Attachment to be added to existing Entry

get.description: Gets matching Expense Items for a given input string

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: String input to be used to generate an array of Expense Items.

parameters.name: disallowFixedItems
parameters.description: Boolean input to be filter fixed items.

200.description: A list of Expense Items for the user.

get.description: Gets the Expense Report determined by query parameters

parameters.name: expenseReportStatus
parameters.description:
Status of the Expense Report. Possible statuses are -
  Draft-> dc76c4fc446c11de98360015c5e6daf6
  In Progress-> dc76c8bc446c11de98360015c5e6daf6
  Approved-> 91b0d382d50848e898733757caa9f84a
  Canceled-> dc76c9b6446c11de98360015c5e6daf6

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Part of date range (creation date) to search for Expense Reports. If start date is not provided, it becomes end date.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Part of date range (creation date) to search for Expense Reports. If end date is not provided, it becomes current date. If neither is provided, then all available expenses are displayed.

200.description: List of Expense Reports returned from query

parameters.name: expenseReportBody
parameters.description: Data to create the new Expense Report

post.description: Submit the Expense Report for approval

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The WID of the Expense Report to be submitted

parameters.name: expenseReportBody
parameters.description: Empty body for expense report approval creation event

post.description: Create a new Expense Report Line for an Expense Report

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The WID for the Expense Report to be modified

parameters.name: expenseReportLineBody
parameters.description: Details of Expense Report Line to be created

id.description: The Workday ID of the Expense Entry.

descriptor.description: The Display ID of the Expense Entry.

date.description: The date the Expense was incurred.
The date the Expense was incurred. Required for non-OCR requests.

hasOCRReceipt.description: Whether the request contains an image attachment to be scanned by OCR. Required for OCR request.

attachments.description: The attachments for Expense Entry. Single image attachment required for OCR request.

attachmentContent.description: The attachment content attached to Expense Entry.

fileLength.description: File length of the uploaded attachment.

expenseReportNumber.description: The number of the Expense Report

WID of the expense report event

error.example: Can only submit Expense Reports that are in Draft Status.

id.description: Workday ID of the class of the expense instance.

descriptor.description: The Display ID for class of the expense instance.

id.description: Workday id for Scan Status instance.

descriptor.description: The Display ID of the scan status.

id.description: Workday ID of the expense status instance.

descriptor.description: The Display ID of the expense status instance.
